changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "investment" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "strategy_id" UUID NOT NULL, "asset_id" UUID NOT NULL, "user_id" UUID NOT NULL, "amount_usd" DECIMAL NOT NULL, "status" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "updated_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, --- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("strategy_id") REFERENCES "strategy" ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("asset_id") REFERENCES "asset" ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "user" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE );
